Dating: NEOLITHIC PERIOD (not before); CHALCOLITHIC PERIOD (not after)
Name: Polished axe
Description: This axe, made of an as yet undetermined material from the Eastern Desert, is characterised by a non-rectilinear edge, slightly curved on one side and worn at its centre. On its sharpened edge, one notices small cuts which demonstrate that the piece was effectively used. This type of tool was intended to accomplish domestic and agricultural works.
